name: Them & Us (itch)
description:
Them & Us is a hardcore, survival horror game with a focus on atmosphere and player immersion.

Them&Usはムードとプレイヤーが世界に入り込める事を重視したハードコアなサバイバルホラーゲームです。

Notes: If you have a good graphic card and the game runs slow, please update your drivers.

Discord: https://discord.me/tendogames

Genre: Survival horror game 

Gameplay: Single Player

Type: Third person view / Mixed camera

Platform: PC

Status: DEMO v1.0.0 /update to 1.0.3

Controller: Full Support

Game Difficulty : Easy / Normal / Hard / Professional

The Story:
The year is 1978 A lone bus, A terrible crash, out upon the old and winding dirt roads which skirt a vast American wilderness. A survivor. A young woman, her mind scarred by a life of tragedy, her name is Alicia. She is alone. She is injured. And around her, quietly, slowly, a surreal and deadly nightmare unfolds.

Fighting for her life, Alicia she finds herself in the midst of events she does not understand- a ‘change’ taking grip on the world around her. It’s nature, it’s cause, unknown.

As night descends, as she pushes further into the unknown - Will she survive? Will you?

This demo takes place somewhere much later in the game.

For best experience we suggest you to use a game controller.
 

ストーリー:

1978年、1台のバスが恐ろしい事故に遭い、広大で荒廃したアメリカ大陸の紆曲した砂利道に投げ出された。生存者は若い女性。彼女の心は悲劇に傷付いている。名前はアリシア。彼女はたった独り。負傷している。辺りはひっそりと、非現実的で、命懸けの悪夢が徐々に広がっていく。

 

アリシアは理解不能な状況下に自分がいる事に気づく。生きる為に戦う事、自分の周りの世界の異変を受け入れていく。それは自然で原因不明の事。

 

夜が更けるに伴れて、彼女は未知の世界へと踏み込んでいく。果たして彼女は、あなたは、生き残る事が出来るだろうか。

Minimum System Requirements

最低動作環境
CPU: Core-i5 or an equivalent
RAM: 4 GB
OS: Windows 7/8.1/10
VIDEO CARD: GeForce GTX 460 or an equivalent 1GB VRAM card
FREE DISK SPACE: 2.5GB
Directx: Version 9c

Recommended Requirements

推奨環境

CPU: Core-i7 or an equivalent
RAM: 8 GB
OS: Windows 7/8.1/10
VIDEO CARD: GeForce GTX 970 or equivalent with 4GBs of VRAM
FREE DISK SPACE: 2.5 GB
Directx:  Version 11
